Objectives 

EXperDB-Management is a integrated management tool for PostgreSQL(for efficient operation and management). The Management Console is a web-based integrated management tool that is provided to ensure the operation and management of eXperDB, and is only available in Enterprise Edition. eXperDB provides data encryption, backup and recovery, migration, security operations, and more. 

  

This project aims to develop eXperDB-Management v2 application with scope of work as below: 



- Planning, design, publishing and develop frontend application. 



- Integration with customer’s API
